text: Klara Geywitz (born 18 February 1976) is a German politician of the Social Democratic Party of Germany (SPD) who served as member of the Landtag of Brandenburg from 2004 until 2019. ==Early life and education== Geywitz was born 1976 in Potsdam in the former German Democratic Republic and studied political science at the University of Potsdam. ==Political career== Geywitz became a member of the SPD in 1994. From 2004 until 2019,Marion Kaufmann (September 2, 2019), Kandidatin für SPD-Vorsitz Klara Geywitz verliert ihren Wahlkreis Der Tagesspiegel. Geywitz was a member of the Landtag of Brandenburg. Among other committee assignments, she served on the Budget Committee from 2009 until 2014. She was always elected in First-past-the-post voting for her electorial district in Potsdam. From 2008 until 2013, Geywitz served as deputy chairwoman of the SPD in Brandenburg, under the leadership of its chairman Matthias Platzeck.Marion Kaufmann (August 20, 2019), Wer ist Klara Geywitz? Eine Strategin für Olaf Scholz Der Tagesspiegel. From 2013 until 2017, she was the party's Secretary General, this time under chairman Dietmar Woidke.Marion Kaufmann (August 20, 2019), Wer ist Klara Geywitz? Eine Strategin für Olaf Scholz Der Tagesspiegel. In the negotiations to form a fourth cabinet under Chancellor Angela Merkel following the 2017 elections, Geywitz was part of her party's delegation. In the 2019 SPD leadership election, Geywitz announced her intention to run for the position as co-chair, together with Olaf Scholz.Madeline Chambers (August 20, 2019), Germany's Scholz picks eastern woman as running mate for SPD chair Reuters. In the final voting round, Norbert Walter-Borjans and Saskia Esken won with 53 per cent of the vote, defeating Geywitz and Scholz who won backing from just 45 per cent of the party base.Tobias Buck (November 30, 2019), Blow to Merkel as leftwingers win SPD leadership Financial Times. At a SPD national convention in 2019, Geywitz was later elected as one of the five deputies of the party's co-chairs Saskia Esken and Norbert Walter-Borjans, alongside Hubertus Heil, Kevin Kühnert, Serpil Midyatli and Anke Rehlinger.SPD-Vizechefs: Kevin Kühnert bekommt mehr Stimmen als Hubertus Heil Der Spiegel, December 6, 2019. ==Other activities== ===Corporate boards=== * Deutsche Druck- und Verlagsgesellschaft (DDVG), Member of the Supervisory BoardSupervisory Board Deutsche Druck- und Verlagsgesellschaft (DDVG). ===Non-profit organizations=== * Foundation for Polish-German Cooperation, Member of the BoardBoard Foundation for Polish- German Cooperation. * Leo Baeck Foundation, Member of the Board of TrusteesBoard of Trustees Leo Baeck Foundation. ==Personal life== Geywitz is married and has three children.Marion Kaufmann (August 20, 2019), Wer ist Klara Geywitz? Eine Strategin für Olaf Scholz Der Tagesspiegel. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1976 births Category:People from Potsdam Category:Members of the Landtag of Brandenburg Category:Social Democratic Party of Germany politicians
title: Klara Geywitz
